title: Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment
posting_body: ['Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment', 'SPACIOUS ENCLOSED PATIO AVAILABLE - LEASE BEFORE AUGUST 1ST AND RECEIVED $500.00 OFF THE MOVE-IN COST', 'Upscale and Urban apartments: Freshly renovated, upgraded modern finishes, naturally well-lit 1 bedroom 1 bathroom in the heart of Downtown Las Vegas.', 'Near the I-95 Freeway, shops, and nightlife on Freemont Street.', 'Just minutes away from Downtown Las Vegas.', 'Freshly painted, Individual patios & enclosed yards available, gated community, Stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, vinyl wood flooring throughout.', 'Exterior & Interior LED efficient lighting, Remodeled laundry room.', 'A pet-friendly community, grassy courtyard & ready for move-in!', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Community Amenities:', '- Limited Access community', '- Social courtyard equipped with BBQ grill, & bench', '- Corn hole toss game', '- On-site/Off-site parking is available', '- Laundry room', '- Outside lighting', '- Ease of access to the best of Downtown Las Vegas.', '- Dedicated Parking', 'Interior Amenities:', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Backsplash in the kitchen glass tile', '- Quartz countertops', '- Upgraded flooring', '- Enclosed spacious patio', '- Full bathroom remodel with backsplash', '- Energy-efficient HVAC', '- Ceiling fans', '- LED efficient lighting', 'Call or email to view the property in person!!', 'show contact info', '.', '<URL>']
